AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqcde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for CDE: Checks whether CDE entry exists in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqgated
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for gated: Checks whether the system is configured to be a router.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqipsec
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for IPSec: Checks whether IPSec is enabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlft
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for LFT: Checks whether LFT is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for loginherald: Checks whether herald value is set.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnosyn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for NoSyn: Checks whether IPSec is enabled. If it is not, then IPSec is enabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqrl
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for root login: Checks whether any non-root user that has login privileges exists.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqrrl
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for remote root login: Checks whether any non-root user with privileges to login remotely exists.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqsed
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for SED: Checks whether the machine has 64 bit kernel support.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnontcb
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for non-TCB: Checks whether the system is non-TCB.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqda
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for disableacct: Adds /bin/false to shells in login.cfg, if it does not exist.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqTE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for Trusted Execution: Checks whether the system has the Trusted Execution feature on.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqssh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for SSHPCIConfig: Checks whether the ssh version is at 7.0 or greater.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_ipsecshunhost
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Shun host for 5 minutes: Shuns the hosts that try to access unused ports for 5 minutes.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_ipsecshunports
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Guard host against port scans: Shuns vulnerable ports for 5 minutes to guard the host against port scans.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_tcptr
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: TCP Traffic Regulation High: Enforces denial-of-service mitigation on popular ports.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_SecureLPM
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable automated IPSEC Tunnel creation between VIO servers during live partition migration.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_ipsecpermit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Allow the packets from HMC restricting inbound and outbound traffic to that which is necessary for the cardholder data environment.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_maxexpired
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Always change vendor-supplied defaults before installing a system on the network. Specifies the maximum time (in weeks) beyond the maxage value that a user can change an expired password to 8.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_maxrepeats
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Always change vendor-supplied defaults before installing a system on the network. For example include passwords, include simple network management protocol(snmp) community strings, and eliminate unnecessary accounts.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_netstat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable netstat: Change vendor supplied defaults before installing a system on the network.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_dissnmpdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable SNMP daemon: Change vendor supplied defaults. Stops SNMP daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_dissnmpmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable SNMPMIBD daemon: Change vendor supplied defaults before installing a system on the network.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_disaixmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable AIXMIBD daemon: Change vendor supplied defaults before installing a system on the network.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_hostmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable HOSTMIBD daemon: Change vendor supplied defaults before installing a system on the network.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_dislpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable lpd daemon: Stops lpd daemon and comments the lpd entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_discde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable CDE: Disables CDE when LFT is not configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_distimedmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable timed daemon: Stops timed daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_disrwhoddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rwhod daemon: Stops rwhod daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_disdpid2dmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable DPID2 daemon: Stops DPID2 daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_disdhcpserv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable DHCP Server: Change vendor supplied defaults before installing a system on the network.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_disdhcpagent
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable DHCP Agent: Stops DHCP relay agent and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_shell
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rshd daemon: Comments the entry for rshd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rshd.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rlogin in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rlogind daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rlogind.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rexecd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rexecd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rexecd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rexecd.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_comsat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable comsat in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for comsat daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of comsat.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_fingerd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable fingerd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for fingerd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of fingerd.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_systat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable systat in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for systat daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of systat.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_tftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable tftpd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for tftpd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of tftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_talk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable talkd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for talkd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of talkd.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rquotad
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rquotad in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rquotad daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rquotad.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rstatd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rstatd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rstatd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rstatd.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rusersd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rusersd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rusersd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rusersd.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rwalld
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rwalld in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rwalld daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rwalld.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sprayd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable sprayd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for sprayd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of sprayd.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_pcnfsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable pcnfsd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for pcnfsd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of pcnfsd.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_tcpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of echo(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_tcpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of discard(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_tcpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of chargen(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_tcpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of daytime(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_tcptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP time service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP time service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of timed(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_udpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of echo(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_udpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of discard(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_udpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of chargen(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_udpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and stops the daytime(udp) service.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_udptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP time service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP time service in /etc/inetd.conf and stops the time(udp) service.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_dtspc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable dtspcd: Comments the entry for dtspcd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf when LFT is not configured and CDE is disabled in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_ttdbserver
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable ttdbserver service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for ttdbserver service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of ttdbserver service.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_cmsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable cmsd service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for cmsd service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of cmsd service.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_ftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable ftpd: Comments the entry for ftpd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and stops ftpd daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_telnet
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable telnetd: Comments the entry for telnetd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and stops telnetd daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_disrmtcmds
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unsecure daemons: Disables unsecure commands rlogin, rsh, rcp, and tftp.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_disrmtdmns
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unsecure daemons: Disables unsecure daemons rlogind, rshd, and tftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_clean_partial_conns
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option clean_partial_conns: Set the value of the network option clean_partial_conns to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_tcp_tcpsecure
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option tcp_tcpsecure: Set the value of the network option tcp_tcpsecure to 7 to protect data against RST and SYN attacks.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rmrhostsnetrc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable .rhosts and .netrc files for all users.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rmetchostsequiv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable or comment out entries from /etc/hosts.equiv file.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_disablepop3d
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: SSL and Early TLS should be disabled in applications: Disable for the pop3d server.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_disableimapd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: SSL and Early TLS should be disabled in applications: Disable for the imap server.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_checkNTP
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: SSL and Early TLS should be disabled in applications: Check the NTP configuration file.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_secureFTPD
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: SSL and Early TLS should be disabled in applications: Check the FTP daemon configuration file.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_secureFTP
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: SSL and Early TLS should be disabled in applications: Check the FTP client configuration file.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sendmailConfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: SSL and Early TLS should be disabled in applications: Disable in sendmail configuration file.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sslversion
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: SSL and Early TLS should be disabled in applications: Check for required SSL version.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rmsuidfrmrcmds
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Configure system security parameters to prevent misuse: Removes SUID from remote commands rcp, rdist, rexec, remsh, rlogin, and rsh.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_filepermgr
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Configure system security parameters to prevent misuse: Remove setuid from privileged commands.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_enablenfs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Configure system security parameters to prevent misuse: Configure the NFS exports to restrict the access.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sshstart
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Check if ssh filesets are installed, Start the sshd daemon if it is not started and configure to start the sshd daemon at every reboot.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sshdaemonprotocol
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must be configured to only use the SSHv2 protocol.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sshclientprotocol
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH client must be configured to only use SSHv2 protocol.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sshlistenaddress
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must only listen on management network addresses unless authorized to listen on any network address for non-management operations.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sshciphers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must be configured to only use FIPS 140-2 approved ciphers.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sshmacs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must be configured to only use Message Authentication Codes (MACs) employing FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hash algorithms.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sshclientciphers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH client must be configured to only use FIPS 140-2 approved ciphers.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sshclientmacs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH client must be configured to only use Message Authentication Codes (MACs) employing FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hash algorithms.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sshAllowGroups
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must restrict login ability to specific users and/or groups.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sshprintlastlogg
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Upon login, the system must display the date and time of the last successful account login.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sshStrictMode
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must perform strict mode checking of home directory configuration files.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sshUsePrivilege
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must use privilege separation.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sshRSAAuthentication
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must not allow rhosts RSA authentication.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sysintegrity
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maintaining the system integrity by detecting, removing and protecting against known types of malicious software.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rmdotfrmpathroot
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove dot from root path: Removes the dot from the PATH environment variable in files .profile, .kshrc, .cshrc, and .login in the root home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rmdotfrmpathnroot
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove dot from non-root path: Removes the dot from the PATH environment variable in files .profile, .kshrc, .cshrc, and .login in the user home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_enableRbac
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implementing Strong Access Control Measure: Enable RBAC by creating so, sa, and isso users with appropriate roles.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_umask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Object creation permissions: Specifies default object creation permissions to 022.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_limitsysacc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Limit system access: Makes root the only user in cron.allow file and removes the cron.deny file.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rootlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Identify all users with a unique user name before allowing them to access system components or card holder data.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_disableacct
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Accounts must be locked after 90 days of inactivity.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Number of login attempts before locking the account: Specifies 6 as the number of consecutive unsuccessful login attempts for each non-root user account before the account is disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_logindisable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable login after unsuccessful login attempts: Specifies 6 as the number of unsuccessful login attempts on a port before the port is locked.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_loginreenable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Reenable login after locking: Specifies the time interval (30 minutes) after which a port is unlocked after being disabled by logindisable.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_autologoff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Set session idle time: Require the user to renter password if the session is idle for more than 15 minutes.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_pwdalgchk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Use strong cryptography: Set the system password algorithm to a stronger cryptographic hash algorithm.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum length for password: Specifies the minimum length of a password to 7 characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_minalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of alphabetic chars: Specifies 1 as the minimum number of alphabetic characters in a password to ensure that the password contains alphabetic characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of non-alphabetic chars: Specifies the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maximum age for password: Specifies the maximum number of weeks (12 weeks, at most 90 days) that a password is valid.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_histexpire
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reuse: Specifies 52 as the number of weeks before a password can be reused.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reuse limit: Specifies 4 as the number of previous passwords a user cannot reuse.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_chkMFA
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Secure access using MFA: Check that the system is configured for multi-factor Authentication (MFA). If not inform how to configure.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_removeguest
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove guest account: Removes guest account and its files.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_audit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable audit: Enables bin auditing.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_entpdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Synchronize all clocks using Time Synchronization technology.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rootrlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remote root login: Disables remote root login. Activation is on a need basis by the system admin following deactivation.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_chetcftpusers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Add root user in /etc/ftpusers file: Adds root username in /etc/ftpusers file.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_sedconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable SED feature: Enable Stack Execution Disable feature.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_rootpwdintchk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Root Password Integrity Check: Ensures that the root password being set is not weak.

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_efsmsg
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Display a message to enable Encrypted File System (EFS).

AIXPertEntry.name: gdprv1_lockacc_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Default system accounts must be disabled.
